alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 10
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 10 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots and lots of bug fixes

beta.title: Tweeten Beta 1.2.1
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Beta 1.2.1 to testers in the beta update channel.

Here's what's new:

  • Fixed new tweet button.
